author: Staff Reporter
text:
On account of Ayya Vaikundar Avadara Thinavizha, local holiday for all government offices and educational institutions (without affecting public examinations) has been declared on March 3 by the district administration.

To compensate the holiday, government offices and educational institutions would function on March 12.

Similarly, a local holiday has been declared for all government offices and educational institutions (without affecting public examinations) on March 7 on account of Shivalaya Ottam to mark Mahasivarathri festival, the holiday would be compensated with full day functioning of government offices and educational institutions on April 9.

On account of the Masi Kodai Vizha at the Mandaicaud Bhagavathi Amman Temple, a local holiday has been declared for all government offices and educational institutions (without affecting public examinations) on March 8, the holiday would be compensated on April 23.

However, the treasury at the district headquarter and its branches in other towns would function with skeletal staff to meet emergency needs, said releases from Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan.
title: Local holidays in Kanyakumari
